system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal
Effect: The user may freely move up to the triple the amont of the Movement Score of their choice when declaring this attack.
Requirement: [Flying] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Flying-Type attack on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Supersonic Skystrike
